import random
m=1000000007
def binpow(l, x):
  res = 1
  while(x > 0):
    if(x % 2 > 0):
      res = res * l % m
    x //= 2
    l = l * l  % m
  return res
n=int(input())
h = (binpow(3,n)+1)//2 - binpow(2,n)
if h >= 0:
  print(h)
else:
  print(h+m)
